title: Ep. 557 - The Shocking And Twisted Origins Of Modern Gender Theory
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, it is now accepted as dogma that gender is a social construct and men and women can change their genders. We’re going to explore the origins of this theory and reveal the truth about the degenerate quack who came up with it. Also Five Headlines, including the dastardly conspiracy that caused Nancy Pelosi to break the lockdown rules by getting her hair done in a salon. She’s the victim here. And in our Daily Cancellation, speaking of victims, we’ll talk about yet another rich celebrity who, it turns out, is being racially oppressed.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
